p: According to the reported method ( Islam et al., 2020), to the test sample, containing 2 mL of solution with serially diluted different concentrations (500 μg/mL to 0.977 μg/mL), 3 mL of a DPPH methanol solution (20 μg/mL) was mixed. The test tubes were kept in a dark place for 30 min at 25 °C and then the absorbance values were measured by a UV spectrophotometer at 517 nm. BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene) was used as positive control.
